reviews.review: 别的不想说，就冲伊丽莎白，神作

I don't know why I didn't get this game a few years back. The combat is like something i've never seen before..its so fun! Th e story is amazing. So far its crazy how you see both protaganists grow as a character. Love it, I can see why people love this game. Very worth it

Esse foi o primeiro Bioshock que joguei, recebi ele de graça no Xbox Live e me apaixonei pela história, o elemento de RPG diferenciado. 

Nesse 3° game da trilogia, a cidade apresentada não é mais Rapture, onde você só consegue jogar por Dlc, mas tudo bem. O ambiente agora é Columbia, uma cidade que flutua, você é Booker De Witt (acho que escrevi certo), você é um investigador, contratado para levar Elizabeth e quitar sua divída, não vou falar mais, porque será spoiler, é sempre importante ir coletando os áudios para que assim entenda melhor a história e os personagens, o que já acontece nos outros Bioshock's. 

Gráficos: 10

História: 8

Um ótimo jogo.

[h1] 先说结论：心目中的神做，10/10。 [/h1]
[hr][/hr]
这无疑是一个精心设计的游戏，多条主线穿插，无论是主角和伊丽莎白的身世线，还是主角与伊的感情线，或者在多维空间中穿插的故事主线，都在肯列文的精心设计下，毫不突兀地徐徐展开。

在这样一个完美结合了乌托邦、蒸汽朋克与量子力学的宏大世界观中，若不表达出设计者的思想，则是种浪费，但深刻的思想与复杂的故事却难以调和。好在电子游戏这一媒介，可以用在此之前完全无法想象的立体表达方式，将作者心中的光与影完全的呈现在人们眼前。

在天空城哥伦比亚，一座由精英建立起来的、漂浮的乌托邦，仍无可避免的有贫民窟的存在。超前的科技与生产力，仅仅只是让城市的表面变得无比繁华，却使社会中充斥着矛盾。天空城掌握的科技，不仅因其野心使战火在世界上蔓延，还加速了城内的礼崩乐坏。
[hr][/hr]
[i] 从《生化奇兵》初代，肯列文就毫不掩饰其对《阿特拉斯耸耸肩》的讽刺。
由精英建立起来的脱离普通人民的城市，终究只是不切实际的幻想。 [/i]
[hr][/hr]
——————以下含有剧透——————

[spoiler] 在主角深入天空城时，多维世界的概念始终紧紧伴随着故事。无论是死亡时的复活，还是如幽灵般伴随着主角一路的路特斯兄妹，都说明着多维世界的概念——只要故事没有终点，无论死亡多少次，都总会有另外维度空间的我们来接力完成任务，直到故事走完。
然而，当主角一路接近真相，发现故事的终点、一切的始作俑者，天父康姆斯托克，竟然是自己；而如今的自己，其实从另一个世界线穿越而来时，故事的另外一层批判才终于向玩家们揭晓。即终点，竟然是起点：曾经的伤膝河战役结束后，主角在是否接受洗礼时的选择，产生了两种世界线，而在其中一个世界线最终酿成了悲剧。

换句话说，只要这个选择存在，之后发生的事就是一个无法打破的循环，就总会有平行世界中的悲剧在继续。
玩家做出的选择，其实早已经被做过无数次，只不过前人都最终失败了而已。这种宿命论，甚至是对游戏形式本身的批判：你在游戏中做的选择，究竟是自己做出的，还是游戏使你做出的，或是说，宿命如此呢？ [/spoiler]
[hr][/hr]
[b] 当《生化奇兵·无限》的叙事模式能够表达如此复杂深刻的思想，将其称为一件艺术品，我想是毫不过分的。而其媒介——电子游戏，也应当拥有被称为“第九艺术”的资格。 [/b]
11 часов геймплея и херовая концовка, + только за гг и главную героиню а так хз хз
Parece que a la gente le encanta Bioshock, pero para mi es un juego aburrido.
타격감, 그래픽, 액션성, OST, 스토리의 전개과정 등 어디하나 흠잡을 곳이 없다. 추가 DLC도 꼭 플레이 해보길 권장한다.

"He's Zachary Comstock."
"He's Booker Dewitt." 
"No. I'm both."

10/10

Bioshock Infinite se sice od prvních dvou dílů liší, to ale nemění nic na tom, že se jedná o skvělou hru! 
Příběh vás chytne a jen tak nepustí, mnohokrát vás překvapí. Gameplay je rozmanitý, ale doporučuju hrát na těžkou obtížnost, hra je jinak velmi snadná.

+ Výborný příběh
+ Pěkná grafika
+ Dobře optimalizované
+ Rozmanité prostředí
+ Rozmanité boje - Vylepšovatelné zbraně, vigory, minibossové

- Hra je lehká i na hard obtížnost
- AI občas tak trošku zaostává :)

Hře bych dal hodnocení 9.5 / 10 ;)

[h1]Gameplay 8.5/10[/h1]

The gameplay is pretty nice. They added 'magic powers' but tbh didnt use much of it.
I always had the misconception of the game being alike dishonored, and it isnt. 
The guns are important in the game.
Couldve done more with the abilities tbh.

[h1]Story 7.5/10[/h1]

Story, the ending is like, wat? Legit abit confusing, certainly at the end. Didnt understand the end for one bit. Even tried looking it up but meh. Throughout the game though, the story is really good and makes the ambience, creates adrenaline.

[h1]Graphics 8/10[/h1]
What's in the trailers are what to expect from it lol.
I like these kinds of graphics and enjoy it with the right story/gameplay implemented to it.

[h1]OVERALL SOLID GAME BUY AT SALES![/h1]

这款游戏简单来说剧情跌宕起伏却又不杂乱，敌人简单却又不失难度，技能繁多却又十分实用，画面鲜亮却又不感虚假，强烈而又真实的代入感，让生化奇兵的吸引力得以延续。
看了下面那些评论写得很好，但我只能用不能平复的心情和来回徘徊眼泪来赞美这件艺术品。
也许这款游戏的人物不像古墓系列一样漂亮的模型，不像cod一样流畅且广泛的按键。但这款游戏足矣有着《羞辱》一样甚至超越的完美。
因为单机在国内并不吃香所以并没有被国内玩家所深知。
但是如果有可能我会毫不犹豫的推荐出去。
满分好评啊。除了win10会崩溃，但是对于显卡的兼容及优化是很好的。
当然这个游戏玩起来累的比较快，个人感觉。
За последние 3 года я не находил такую шикарную игру,с красивой графикой,лёгким управлением и особенно впечатляющим сюжетом.Это просто топ,игра действительно стоит своих денег.
大作，推荐
Great game with an incredible story. Even if you were a bit disatisfied with Bioshock 2, give this a try.
pluje sobie w brode, ze nie zagrałem w nią wcześniej. 10/10

The third of the Bioshock series, this time taking place in Colombia, a flying utopian city that seceded from the United States, led by a self-proclaimed "prophet" Zachary Comstock, where he is a Jesus figure and the Founding Fathers are served as the Gods. Former Pinkerton detective Booker Dewitt, in order to clear his debts, accepts a mission to rescue a missing girl named Elizabeth. He travels to Colombia, where he is branded a "False Shepherd" and pursued by the authorities. When she reaches Elizabeth, this simple rescue plan takes several twists and turns, revealing the hidden secrets of Colombia and Comstock, and eventually leading to a shocking conclusion... 

Ah, the visuals, visuals, visuals!!! Not enough can be said about the breathtaking visuals of <Bioshock Infinite>. Beautiful visuals that deserve marks more than a 10/10: largely based on the early 20th century America, so many attention to details(the people, the shops, the streets, the buildings, everything else!) that players can wander around hours searching for them. With less limitations than the nautical Rapture had, the atmosphere and the setting of the city certainly is an outstanding experience up in the air. 

Great, memorable characters, with solid development, especially from Elizabeth, who may probably be the greatest female supporting character since Alyx Vance. Fabulous voice acting, particularly from the lead actors of Booker and Elizabeth.

Story earns marks for richness, ambition and huge scale, but occasionally feels like it's throwing in too many elements, including political, religious, and social ideologies, racism, American exceptionalism, propaganda, alternate dimensions, poltergeists, AND Bioshock, to the point where the player forgets that they're actually playing a Bioshock game. Regardless, guranteed that this game will not be simple like the first Bioshock. Still would have been great enough if the creators stuck to the generic Super Mario formula.  

Outstanding gameplay! Adrenaline pumping gameplay that will always keep you occupied. More weapons, unique superpowers, or "Vigors", and skylines which you can ride with a "Sky-hook" helping you with combat, and tons more! The game throws a lot of gameplay information at you but is not to the point of frustration. 

An unforgettable experience in Single Player first person shooting with some of the best visuals and settings in a video game. You will never see George Washington, Thomas Jefferson, and Benjamin Franklin the same way you did again. 

9/10

bioshock infinite is a really great game, it has one of the best stories in all of gaming and the ending is one for the ages.
i only have one complaint with the game and it's that the combat happens super often to the point where it can get repetitive but the game itself doesn't overstay its welcome so it might not even be much of an issue for people. the gunplay is really great too so it doesn't hold it down too much. 

9/10

Damm, Este juego, su historia, su Season pass con los capitulos Burial at Sea 1 y 2, y con un gran pegon entre la historia del infinite una locura.. Un GRAN juegazo y con encariñarte con Elisa que te de dinero, balas, botiquines  y mientras descubres poco a poco como va ese final y que en la parte que la engañamos siga enfadada cuando nos revive xD... Es unos de los juegos que me gusto estuvo bueno, los clasicos poderes (aunque fueron cambiados creo que como remasterisados algunos y quise que ver si el de las abejas seguia pero neh, fue cambiado por cuervos) Creia que iva seguir con lo de las niñas malditas y ello como en el 1 y 2.. El final fue lo que me puso triste aunque tuve que jugarmelo dos veses por que me confundi y tuve que ver un video para entender el final xD.... Jugabilidad Historia y Alguna que otra Parte Feliz ajajaaj.... 

Como sea, un juego que que si eres bien pinche vicioso o buscas en juegos de historia solo  para ver... creo que este es tu juego xD.

Comstock: “我”， 是谁？
Booker: 我哪知道你是谁啊？哎，你到底什么意思啊？
Comstock: 这就得从人和宇宙的关系讲起……就拿你来说吧，长久以来，一直有一个问题困扰着你。
Booker: 什么问题？
Comstock: “我”是谁？
Booker: 这我已经知道了呀。
Comstock: 不，你不知道。你是谁？Booker Dewitt吗？这只是一个名字，一个代号。你可以叫Booker，我也可以叫，他们都可以。但，把这个代号拿掉之后呢？你，是谁？
Booker: 我...我不知道。 我也不用知道。
Elizabeth: 那好，你再回答我一个问题，我是谁？
Booker: 这个问题已经问过了。
Comstock: 不，刚才问的是本我，现在问的是自我。
Booker: 有什么区别吗？
Comstock: 当我用“我”这个代号进行对话时，你的代号也是“我”，这是不是意味着你是我，而我也是你呢？
Booker: 这这...这种问题没有意义。
Comstock: 那就问几个有意义的。我生从何来？死往何处？我为何要存在这个世界上？对这个世界来说，我的出现，意味着什么？是我选择了世界，还是世界选择了我？
Booker: 够了！
Comstock: 我和宇宙之间有必然的联系吗？宇宙有没有尽头?时间有没有长短？过去的时间从哪里消失？未来的时间在哪里停止?我在这一刻提的问题，还是你刚才听到的问题吗?
Booker: 我杀了你！
Comstock: 是谁杀了我，而我又杀了谁！！
Booker: 是我，杀了我？
Comstock: 回答正确，动手吧！

于是，Booker就杀掉了Comstock...

[spoiler]话说我们的男主Booker总是脱发，在Elizabeth带他在各种平行世界中穿梭了一段时间之后，他也拥有了Elizabeth的能力[/spoiler]

The atmosphere is pretty cool, not the classical steampunk thing you could think about but still cool. The graphic part is very good, you could just play to stare at the environment and not just because is well done but also because of how the places were imagined. Obviously the gamepaly is interesting too!

Alors... "Bioshock Infinte" , certes il n'est pas digne de son grand frere (Bioshock) et vous ne trouverez pas l'ambiance sombre et ténébreuse du premier jeu. Vous ne prierez pas de ne pas tomber nez a nez avec des creatures diaboliques ou qui tout simplement vous font peur (et oui on peu pas test les "Little-Sisters" ou bien les "Big-Daddies").

Mais meme si on ne retrouve pas vraiment cet aspect des deux premiers jeux ou on esperait savoir pourquoi tout etait comme ca et ou meme la ville pouvait ressembler un personaje grace a son histoire tres poussé on pourra trouver une histoire qui te touche forcement en te connectant peu a peu au personaje de Elizabeth qui on verra comme notre petite soeur, notre copine ou qui que se soit qui nous soit cher. 

Toujours ce petit style de graphismes qui est unique a la serie des bioshock ce jeu peu etre evité si tu ne cherche pas vraiment un jeu de tir fantaisiste-
Girls just wanna have fun.

oyun dünyasının geldiği şu günlerde malasef iyi bir senaryosu olan oynanışı güzel atmosferi güzel bir oyun bulmak zor.Eğer sende benim gibi bi hikayesi olan çizgisel bir oyun arıyorsan bu oyunu almalısın.
eleştireceğim yönlerde var tabiki
-oyunda özel güçlerimiz var yaklaşık 10 taneydi galiba ama hiçbiri işe yaramıyor.oyunun %95 ini silahla bitirdim bazıyerlerde kulandım
-karkterler bakımından yanınızdaki elizabeth müthiş onun dışında yan karakterler güzel amaaa oynadığımız karakter kötü hatta adını bile hatırlayamadım.
aklıma bunlar geldi oyunu oynamadıysanız mutlaka alın

这是迄今为止给我震撼最大的一款游戏，真正的神作。

  我不敢保证我完全理解了它，如项链的变化，场景颜色的变化，Comstock和Booker错综复杂的关系和它们的象征义。

  但那精细的场景，原作和海葬的神级剧情，以及Elizabeth，让我彻底折服。
  
  若满分10分，[spoiler]我给100。[/spoiler]
diosssssss  una maldita obra maestra ¡que esperas compralo ya!
Oyun mükemmel olması rağman dlc paketini yüklemeye başladığınız an tadınız kaçıyor. 21.9 GB nedir? Nasıl indirilir? Ne içindir? Bu soruların cevabını aldığım an yorumumu değiştiricem. Teşekkürler.

Just finished the expansions that came with the season pass. The main game and the two expansions are very linear if you are into that. I thought it was OK. The story line for each was interesting, but the ending sucked for all 3. If you like happy endings, do not go here. The main game gave you plenty of chances for money and boost, while the expansions basically starve you to death throughout the whole game. 
For a one time experience, and purchasing it real cheap during the last winter sale, it was worth it for the game and season pass. Anymore higher in price for an older game like this would question the value of owning it. Overall, I gave the game a B- for a grade.
This game is the most beatiful game I've ever played! The steampunk style is just breath-taking!

Awesome game.

Not as creepy as the first two, which is a plus for me personally. And an amazingly nice storyline which really keeps you going. Gameplay can get a bit repetitive, but trying out different combo's of powers and the storyline pulls you through. Infinitly recommendable!
